title: Why do some people think that Elvis Presley is still alive? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because clearly they are in denial, which is a process of mourning. For some reason fans have hard time accepting their idol’s death or their idol’s flaws. Elvis had a chronic drug abuse and chronic health ailments, which led to his untimely demise. They prefer to believe that the artist they admire is hiding somewhere and has faked their death either to clear up their finances, which is often the case with posthumous album sales, or enjoy a simple life without being chased by the paparazzi. There is absolutely no proof that Elvis is alive or any other star for that matter. Elvis Presley, Marilyn Monroe, James Dean, John Lennon, Michael Jackson, Prince are ALL DECEASED. God rest their souls.

Why do people think (or thought) that Elvis was alive after he died? A lot of people don’t remember the newspaper articles so many years later after his death about men going through surgery to look like Elvis Presley. Believe it or not -I believe that’s why there were so many people screaming that Elvis wasn’t dead? Seriously, that is what happened and people couldn’t remember the article but I do have a good memory even to the point reading about guys wanting to look and be Elvis - I’m not saying that a lot of these guys were considered to be “Imitators of Elvis” because a lot of them were but others that were such big fanatics of Elvis went to some extreme surgery to become him.
